data: Colonel Fenchurch stood on his own hearthstone—that is to say, the smoking-room rug—with his back to the fire, and a cup of tea in his hand.
Colonel Fenchurch stood on his own hearthstone--that is to say, the smoking-room rug--with his back to the fire, and a cup of tea in his hand.
